answers.answer: Hi!A slightly higher than normal value can come due too dehydration—either due to not drinking enough water, or doing the test within 24 hours of taking alcohol, or if you have diabetes. So repeat the test after ruling out these factors.If hemoglobin is still high then it can be due to increased RBC or red blood cells or due to polycythemia vera.Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: Hi I'm 18 y old and I have hgt 0.54 normal is 0.41 0.50, I done all blood searches and it seems that everything else accept Mon % which is 11.3 to 8.5 -10 so 1.3 higher than normal. Does any one have same problem, or can some one help me?
title: High hemoglobin
